Add a bit of color and fragrance: Grass: It would be marvelous if we could decorate our merchandise shelves with lots of plants. Could we have Grass-type Pokémon come help?
Aiming for that punk look: Poison: We want to use poison to dye our cloths in wonderful colors! Please send us your Poison-type Pokémon!
I want my plants to grow: Rock: I've got some plants that only grow on rocky terrain. I'd like some rough, Rock-type Pokémon to keep my precious plants company.
Just keep running: Dark: We need some Pokémon to try on our shoes. To make sure the shoes can handle rough use, Dark-type Pokémon would be ideal.
Dark: We would like to hire Dark-type Pokémon. People reveal their true natures when gripped by fear, after all...
Let's see what kind of person they are: Dark: We would like to hire Dark-type Pokémon. People reveal their true natures when gripped by fear, after all...
Making cute designs: Fairy: I'm attempting to create clothing that is cute but also a little mystic. I need the help of Fairy-type Pokémon!
Multi-purpose fabric development: Normal: We're looking for Normal-type Pokémon! Together we can make cloth that you can use in any way you like!
Sailing over the water: Water: This job involves carrying cargo over the water. We're looking for Water-type Pokémon.
Show us your motivation: Fire: We need Pokémon with burning motivation— a fire in their hearts! We need the heat of your passion!
Showing off the durability: Fighting: We want to emphasize how durable our shoes are. We would be very grateful if Fighting-type Pokémon could come help out.
So that our crops stay healthy: Bug: We are welcoming Bug-type Pokémon to help thin out the weeds growing in our farmland!
To ensure safe operations: Electric: We need electricity in order to inspect the monorail! We're waiting for you, Electric-type Pokémon!
We want to use the best water: Water: We want to take particular care in what water we use to brew my coffee. I'd like Pokémon that are knowledgeable about such things.
We've started a food delivery service: Flying: Food is best eaten hot! We'd like to see some Flying-type Pokémon to help fly our meals directly to our customers.
Building a solid car: Ground: Solid, steady Ground-type Pokémon provide the ideal foundation to build cars upon! Let's build cars together!
Cruising through the icy waters: Ice: This job involves carrying cargo over icy seas. We're looking for Ice-type Pokémon.
Delicate, high-quality fabric: Bug: We're looking for Bug-type Pokémon! Let's make the most delicate cloth together!
Good cloth requires good string: Bug: To all Bug-type Pokémon! Please come lend us your strength so that we can create lovely cloth!
Help wanted on our farm: Grass: Nobody can deny that Grass-type Pokémon are the best at handling plants! We would be overjoyed if some could help us out!
Surprise delivery: Ghost: We firmly believe that surprise is the spice of life. We'd like to get Pokémon that can bring people's orders with a little dash of horror.
That extra mysterious touch: Psychic: As a final touch, we like to use psychic powers to make the feel of our cloth truly unique. Would any Psychic-type Pokémon be interested?
The basics of cooking: Fire: In order to ensure the perfect stove temperature when cooking, I want to have Pokémon that are good at burning things come help.
To make our food even more delicious: Dragon: We need Dragon-type Pokémon to help us prepare our food before we cook it. We're not sure why!
To properly season our dishes: Rock: Rock salt, as the name implies, can be found within rocks. We need the help of rock-solid Pokémon to get it!
To see that we get some magical people: Fairy: We'd like to have some purehearted Fairy-type Pokémon to help us judge the true characters of our workers.
Assembling ships: Steel: Ship assembly requires a lot of steel to be cut. We're looking for Steel-type Pokémon to come help us out!
Customer acquisition: Fairy: We'd like to have Pokémon that are cute and charming come over to help attract customers!
Developing sports shoes: Bug: We're making sports shoes! We'd like to have Bug-type Pokémon with lots of legs to help us develop them. Thanks!
Fixing up the city's electrical grid: Ground: We need some help setting up power lines. It'd be great if we could get Pokémon that are immune to electricity.
Gotta keep things growing: Ground: The dirt dictates how well plants do. We ask Ground-type Pokémon to come and help us create fertilizer.
Hardcore Pokémon for a wild product: Dark: We've made some really wild, hardcore shoes. We'd like to get Dark-type Pokémon to wear them, since they'll fit the image perfectly!
Help wanted finding books: Psychic: We would really be grateful if Psychic-type Pokémon could come and use its powers to quickly search for the books we have in stock!
Inspection requires strength: Fighting: We are looking for Fighting-type Pokémon that can use their strength and skill to help with monorail inspection and maintenance!
Making cloth with strong string: Bug: We would like Bug-type Pokémon to assist us in producing durable cloth.
Recruiting detail-oriented Pokémon: Normal: High-quality cloth requires delicate and precise handwork. Are there any Normal-type Pokémon that would like to try?
Testing our railcars: Electric: We would appreciate Electric-type Pokémon that could help power the machinery used in assembly of our railcars.
To invent psychic cloth: Psychic: To all Psychic-type Pokémon! Please come lend us your strength so that we can create some absolutely mind-bending cloth!
We need Pokémon that can handle cold: Ice: We need to get our shipments through blizzards, and the best type of Pokémon to do that is Ice-type Pokémon!
We need some nets: Bug: The only Pokémon capable of creating nets that are both durable and flexible are Bug-type Pokémon! We want you!
We're making lenses for glasses: Rock: We use extremely hard rocks for grinding and polishing our lenses. We would like to recruit Rock-type Pokémon.
What it means to roast beans: Fire: The temperature needs to be just right when roasting coffee beans. Would you be so kind as to send over Fire-type Pokémon?
A super-exciting show: Dragon: We want to make movies that really have a sense of impact—of scale. Could we hire Dragon-type Pokémon to help out?
As guidelines for durability: Steel: We need superbly durable Steel-type Pokémon to help out with car manufacturing. Let's build cars together!
Capable customer reception required: Normal: We would like to have Normal-type Pokémon for customer reception, as they are able to handle many different situations and tasks.
Dependable security guard: Fighting: I work in airport security. We'd like to get Pokémon that are skilled in martial arts to come help us out.
Developing powerful shoes: Fighting: We're making wrestling shoes! We'd like to have powerful Fighting-type Pokémon help us develop them. Thanks!
For safe and quick deliveries: Flying: Swift and graceful deliveries! We'd like to have Flying-type Pokémon like Pelipper come help us out!
Good water for our desserts: Water: In order to create delicious, moist desserts, I would like to ask for Water-type Pokémon to help in measuring out the ingredients.
Help wanted making luxurious cloth: Bug: If one wants to make a truly luxurious cloth, one must use only the best silk. Would any Bug-type Pokémon be interested?
Help with cooking: Fire: Need cooking assistants. Must be good with fire.
Horror TV show production: Ghost: I want to create a horror show the likes of which have never been seen. Please send me Pokémon that are good at being terrifying!
Hull inspectors wanted: Water: We need Water-type Pokémon to dive beneath the ships and inspect the hulls.
Into the shrubbery: Grass: We often have to make deliveries to really grassy areas, so Grass-type Pokémon would be a huge help.
Making the perfect cloth: Normal: We want to create the perfect normal cloth. We need the help of Normal-type Pokémon to do so!
Mixing together dangerous chemicals: Poison: One man's poison is another man's tonic. We would like Poison-type Pokémon to help us prepare prescriptions.
Poison against poison, just in case: Poison: We would like to enlist the help of Poison-type Pokémon, as they are no doubt resistant to toxins.
Poison: We are running some experiments involving chemical reactions. We'd like to receive Pokémon that can withstand hazardous chemicals!
Pokémon that can deliver in any weather: Dragon: We would like to hire Dragon-type Pokémon capable of flying through even the roughest weather conditions.
Provide the best service at all times: Normal: We need Normal-type Pokémon, since they're good at handling all sorts of different customers.
We want help solving problems: Psychic: We are looking for Psychic-type Pokémon so that they can sense the thoughts and needs of any customer experiencing troubles.
We want to make truly magical cloth: Fairy: To all Fairy-type Pokémon! Please come lend us your strength so that we can create some magical cloth!
Construction work, heavy lifting: Fighting: Construction needs power! Power means muscles! Please send Pokémon with big muscles!
Fixing up the city's lights: Electric: We need to do some work on power lines, so if we could get Pokémon that are good at manipulating electricity, that'd be great.
Flight escort: Dragon: I would like Dragon-type Pokémon! These sacred creatures of legend are the most fitting to watch over my air travels!
Foundation for assembling railcars: Ground: We are building teams that will assemble our railcars. We're looking for Ground-type Pokémon to help us out.
I want more contracts: Ghost: I feel like I could get more contracts if I was with Pokémon that look like they've actually seen the afterlife!
I want our ranch to be a good place: Grass: Please send Grass-type Pokémon that can keep an eye on the quality of the turf around our ranch!
Keeping our veggies fresh: Water: Vegetables need to be crisp and well hydrated! We'd love to have some Water-type Pokémon come and help us out.
Dark: I'd like to do my rounds with Dark-type Pokémon to give my offers a bit more...gravitas.
Recruiting customer support: Normal: All our customers must be treated equally! We need exemplary Normal-type Pokémon to help us out!
Time to do some maintenance: Steel: There've been some problems reported about the tracks we use. We'd like Steel-type Pokémon to come have a look for us.
Time to harvest: Bug: We're hoping to get some help for harvesting our vegetables. Bug-type Pokémon are always a huge help!
To make delightfully chilled desserts: Ice: In order to make delightfully chilled desserts, I would like to have some Ice-type Pokémon come to help out with temperature management.
We need help in the air: Flying: On and on, over the horizon... We hope that Pokémon that have fallen in love with the sky will come fly with us.
We need help sorting our packages: Steel: We're recruiting for help sorting out electronics that need to delivered. We're looking for Pokémon that are good with metal.
We're building a massive ship: Electric: When building ships, we use electricity to weld large blocks together. We would like Pokémon that could help out with this.
You can't cook without it: Ice: Ice is needed for everything in the food industry, whether it's for dishes or drinks. We need the help of Ice-type Pokémon!
A fabric that inspires legends: Dragon: I want to make a cloth that will inspire legends! I need the help of Dragon-type Pokémon to achieve my goal!
Ghost: We're doing a show about haunted photos. Could we get Pokémon that would make convincing photos of this sort?
A speedy delivery: Flying: Food needs to be delivered fresh! We need help from Pokémon that are at home in the sky!
Creating lightweight shoes: Electric: We're making running shoes! We'd like to have Electric-type Pokémon that can run at lightning speeds help us out. Thanks!
Looking for flowers: Poison: I want to go to the forest to pick flowers, but it's full of dangers! Could I have some Poison-type Pokémon, since they're good against plants?
Making a sound foundation: Ground: We need to level the ground where we're planning to do construction. We really need Ground-type Pokémon to help us out!
Making high-quality clothing: Bug: Good cloth requires good silk! Please send us Bug-type Pokémon!
Muscle talk: Fighting: I want to inform people about the importance of keeping in shape! Could you send me Pokémon with amazing muscles?
Nothing like a little aroma therapy: Grass: Our employees have to go to dangerous places to work, and so we'd like to surround them with some greenery and nice Pokémon for relaxation.
Our specialty dishes: Fire: We're awful proud of the grill here at our restaurant. We'd be grateful for Pokémon that can keep the flame going while we grill!
So you think you're strong: Fighting: A strong body is the greatest tool on any construction site! We're looking for Fighting-type Pokémon!
To provide the best customer care: Normal: We are looking for Normal-type Pokémon that can flexibly respond to the needs of all our customers.
We need models for our clothing: Fairy: We're trying to make a line of new, adorable clothing pieces. We would like Fairy-type Pokémon to come help us out.
We need some quick cleaning: Fairy: Looking for housekeeping services! We need a Pokémon that can quickly clean up any mess like a little house fairy!
We want sparkly clean floors: Ice: We need help waxing the floors! Accepting any Pokémon that can make the floors here chillingly easy to slip on!
Assembling our trains: Steel: We need Steel-type Pokémon and their skill in using metal and machines to help assemble our railcars.
Check with psychic powers: Psychic: Debugging can be mind-bending sometimes... Are there Pokémon that could maybe use some mysterious powers to find bugs?
Cute receptionists, please: Fairy: We'd like cute, delicate Pokémon to man our front desk. It would do wonders to add some cheer to the place!
Delicious delightful ice cream: Ice: I want to make a deliciously chilled ice cream. Please send Ice-type Pokémon!
Flower delivery service: Grass: I've come up with a brilliant idea... A flower delivery service! So, please send Pokémon that know a lot about plants and flowers!
Get those rocks out of the way: Rock: There are always large rocks kicking around the mining area. We'd like to have Rock-type Pokémon, since they know how to deal with rocks.
Need help plowing fields: Fighting: Any Pokémon that have strong arms are welcome. We need help plowing our fields!
Need to wash away all the grime: Water: The monorail's gotten rather dirty, so we'd like Water-type Pokémon to come help make it nice and clean!
Our new line of shoes: Bug: We are planning to use silk to create a new shoe. We welcome any Bug-type Pokémon.
Railcar inspection and maintenance: Steel: We would like some help from Pokémon that know a lot about metal. You know, Pokémon that are pretty metallic themselves!
Safety Checks: Flying: We need some help doing maintenance, so if we could get Pokémon that are good with high places, that would be great.
Spreading spooky knowledge: Ghost: I want to set up a section on occult books! Do you think you could send me Ghost-type Pokémon to do the advertising?
Substation servicing: Electric: When it comes to inspecting transformer stations, nothing does a better job than Electric-type Pokémon!
The delicious secret of our hotel: Fire: The secret to cooking is fire! We welcome any Fire-type Pokémon, as they're great at working with flames.
Through water and fire: Dragon: Pokémon that can push through areas that are on fire or dripping water, please come help us!
To keep our guests toasty warm: Fire: We are looking for Fire-type Pokémon so that customers who are sensitive to the cold can have rooms that are toasty warm.
We need Pokémon to try on our clothes: Dark: We want to develop durable cloth that can stand up to even the harshest treatment. We request Dark-type Pokémon to help out with this!
We need some music around here: Electric: We need help wiring up audio equipment and the like. Pokémon that have a knack for that sort of thing are more than welcome.
We need some solid help for shipping: Ground: We'd really appreciate getting solid Pokémon that are really well-grounded to help us lug some big luggage.
Appearances matter for security guards: Dark: There's a dangerous area we need to keep folks out of. I need fierce-looking Pokémon. No need for them to do anything. I just need them around.
Cooking temperature is all important: Fire: Our cook needs assistants! Please send Fire-type Pokémon that are good at maintaining perfect cooking temperatures!
Electricity is so useful: Electric: We use electricity to remove impurities from copper, so we would like to hire Electric-type Pokémon!
Emergency refill needed: Water: There's one thing that we absolutely need to put out fires, and we're looking for a Pokémon that can help us refill our fire truck!
Experimenting with medicinal herbs: Grass: Medicinal herbs are best handled by Pokémon that are familiar with various leaves and roots.
Falling rocks hurt quite a bit: Rock: Falling rocks can be a real hazard where we work. Pokémon that know a lot about rocks, please help!
Good water makes good food: Water: Clean water is the basis for delicious meals! We'd like to hire Pokémon that have an eye for water quality.
Looking to promote insurance policies: Poison: The sole purpose of this job is to demonstrate the dangers of poison—nothing more. Show us your best moves!
Making a fabric that can't be cut: Bug: We want to develop cloth that can't be cut, and for that, we need the help of Bug-type Pokémon! Please send them our way!
Making sweets is all about the image: Fairy: I really want to emphasize how light and fluffy our products are. Please send Fairy-type Pokémon!
Need help watering wide areas: Flying: We are looking to water our plants from the sky. Flying-type Pokémon, please feel free to apply!
Need some help with digging: Ground: We need Pokémon that know a lot about the ground, since we're trying to mine the ore here in the Galar region. Please send Ground types!
Nothing too serious: Dark: We've had some problems with people falling asleep on the job. We'd like to have intimidating Pokémon around to keep an eye on things.
Pokémon immune to poison, please: Steel: We sometimes need to make use of potentially poisonous chemicals. We would like Steel-type Pokémon since they are immune to poison.
Researching mysterious powers: Psychic: Please let us research the mysterious psychic powers that certain Pokémon can use.
Solving unsolved mysteries: Ghost: In order to help us solve many inexplicable mysteries, please send us Pokémon that are really haunting.
We need taste testers, please: Normal: I would like Normal-type Pokémon to show off how delicious my sweets are by eating them in a delicious way.
We'll deliver to any location: Dragon: We're looking for rugged Pokémon that can handle rain, lightning, and even raging fires!
A good show about cleaning: Poison: We're doing a special on sewer systems! Could we get Poison-type Pokémon? They can handle the smell.
A type that can handle danger, please: Dark: Transporting money can be dangerous. We'd like to hire Pokémon that have a dark aura about them, to scare away any bad guys.
Cold delivery: Ice: In order to transport frozen foods in the perfect environment, we need some chilly Pokémon.
Construction survey: Ground: I'd like to do a proper survey of the land condition before we begin construction. Are there Pokémon that could help me out?
Cooking competition show: Fire: I'm looking to create a red-hot cooking competition show—one that's on FIRE! Do you have any ideas for Pokémon that'd help?
Cute, fantastical Pokémon wanted: Fairy: We need help cleaning up guest rooms. We would like Pokémon that are cute and pure to come help us out.
Even in the vacuum of space: Poison: We're hoping to create fabric that can be used in space! Please send Flying-type Pokémon!
Handling complaints: Ghost: Complaint management means dealing with the grudges and curses of the customers. Is there a type of Pokémon that loves these?
Help wanted carrying books: Fighting: We would like to have really strong Pokémon come help us, since we need to carry heavy books like dictionaries and whatnot.
Keep an eye on our network: Electric: It's a simple job of just keeping an eye on our various networks. Please send us Pokémon that are good with different signals and wavelengths.
Normal help is the best help: Normal: I want to create dishes that'll be accepted by everyone. I'd like to get input from common, plain, normal Pokémon.
Our flowers need help: Water: All plants need water! And as it so happens, Water-type Pokémon are the best at watering plants!
Our truck needs a wash: Water: Our delivery truck's gotten a bit dirty, so we want to wash it off and make it shine again! We're waiting for Pokémon that can help!
Pokémon strong against physical attacks: Rock: They might get zapped a bit by electricity, but we would really like to get some powerful Pokémon that are good with rocky terrain!
Preparing for anything: Dragon: In order to ensure we are prepared for any kind of case, we are searching for Pokémon resistant to the Fire, Water, Grass, and Electric types.
Preparing for nature: Poison: In order to prepare for cases in natural areas, we are searching for Pokémon resistant to the Grass, Bug, and Fairy types.
Preparing for strange things: Steel: In order to prepare for particularly strange cases, we are searching for Pokémon resistant to the Psychic, Flying, and Fairy types.
Recording the cries of bugs: Bug: Recordings of the superb cries of Bug-type Pokémon are all the rage now, and we'd like to record yours, too!
Removing impurities: Fire: We need to remove impurities from various metals. We need Pokémon who can handle flame, so please send Fire-type Pokémon!
To meet our customers' needs: Psychic: System engineers need to be able to tell exactly what customers want. Send us Pokémon that can read minds somehow.
To protect our investments: Dragon: We'd like to see Pokémon that look strong enough to deter even the most determined criminals. Please send us Dragon types!
Top-secret project: Ghost: wE ARe searChing for somE HelP. THE wOrk MUst be kepT coMPletEly secreT. We wiLl PAY You HANdsomly.
